text: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha kālāmā adoso purisassa ajjhattaṃ uppajjamāno uppajjati pe amoho purisassa ajjhattaṃ uppajjamāno uppajjati pe hitāya sukhāyā ti
edit: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha kālāmā adoso purisassa ajjhattaṃ uppajjamāno uppajjati pe amoho purisassa ajjhattaṃ uppajjamāno uppajjati pe hitāya sukhāyā ti

translations.transtext: How do you think about that, Kālāmas? [When] arising inside a person, does the absence of anger arise for usefulness or uselessness? ... does the absence of delusion arise for usefulness or uselessness? ... [it is] for usefulness [and] happiness for a long time.
